title.narrative: Participatory Citywide Urban Upgrading (Pcwuu) In Egypt

description.narrative:
In line with UN-Habitat Housing and slum-upgrading program and the vision to approach informal areas from a city wide perspective, this cooperation aims at supporting ISDF to set up an integrated and inclusive strategy for urban upgrading and development in informal areas. This strategy will include classification and identification of priority interventions for various types of informality as well as guidelines and tools for implementation. The project will additionally support management of implementation of priority interventions and the cooperation might extend to implement some pilot cases and interventions using and testing the developed tools and guidelines.The project will avail a platform for sharing knowledge and information on the process, guidelines and lessons learned. In addition, this project will provide enhanced opportunity for defined target informal communities to access formal land and housing and improve community liveability and quality of living. The most vulnerable unsafe target communities will be prioritized for upgrading responding to basic needs of adequate housing conditions.To enable building up the strategy for addressing Informal areas in Egypt, It is essential to create an integrated framework and learn from the experiences and successful comparable global efforts as part of an overall preventive and proactive strategy for informal areas upgrading/control in Egypt. This will be based on a rapid profiling exercise, and backed up with legislation and capacity building support. It is also essential to set the monitoring mechanism that shall enable measuring the effectiveness of the strategies used and enable redirecting according to the progress measured.
This strategy will be strongly supported by UN-Habitat regional and global experience in housing and slum upgrading in cooperation with the ISDF, GIZ and MHUUC and the target communities. UN-Habitat will provide both knowledge services on urban upgrading categories, tools and guidelines, in addition to or high-level policy advisory services on housing and informal upgrading.

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya
